searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT c.PKID, loanAgent.CASE_CODE, INFO.PROPERTY_ADDR, loanAgent.LOAN_SRV_CODE AS LOAN_SRV_CODE_OLD, loanAgent.EXECUTOR_ID AS EXECUTOR_ID_OLD, loanAgent.EXCUTOR_TEAM, loanAgent.EXCUTOR_DISTRICT, loanAgent.CREATOR_ID AS CREATE_ID_OLD, isnull(Convert(decimal(18,2),sign.CON_PRICE/10000),0) as 'CON_PRICE', loanAgent.APPLY_TIME, loanAgent.SIGN_TIME, loanAgent.CREATE_TIME, loanAgent.RELEASE_TIME, isnull(Convert(decimal(18,2),loanAgent.LOAN_AMOUNT/10000),0) as 'LOAN_AMOUNT', isnull(Convert(decimal(18,2),loanAgent.SIGN_AMOUNT/10000),0) as 'SIGN_AMOUNT', isnull(Convert(decimal(18,2),loanAgent.ACTUAL_AMOUNT/10000),0) as 'ACTUAL_AMOUNT', c.ORG_ID, c.DISTRICT_ID, C.LEADING_PROCESS_ID, caseInfo.GRP_NAME, caseInfo.QJDS_NAME, finOrg.FIN_ORG_NAME as 'finOrgName', loanAgent.cust_name as custName, caseInfo.AGENT_NAME as AgentName, '' as zjName, '' as custCardType, '' as custPaper FROM sctrans.T_TO_LOAN_AGENT loanAgent INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE c ON c.CASE_CODE = loanAgent.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO caseInfo ON caseInfo.CASE_CODE = loanAgent.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_SIGN sign ON loanAgent.CASE_CODE = sign.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO INFO ON INFO.CASE_CODE = loanAgent.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG finOrg ON finOrg.FIN_ORG_CODE = loanAgent.FIN_ORG_CODE <ifNotNull isJygw> and loanAgent.EXECUTOR_ID = #userId# </ifNotNull> INNER JOIN sctrans.v_yucui_org_hierarchy orgHierarchy ON orgHierarchy.ORG_ID = loanAgent.executor_team WHERE loanAgent.CASE_CODE is not null and loanAgent.CASE_CODE !=''
<ifNotNull caseCode> and loanAgent.CASE_CODE= #caseCode# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull propertyAddr> and INFO.PROPERTY_ADDR like #propertyAddr# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull loanSrvCode> and loanAgent.LOAN_SRV_CODE = #loanSrvCode# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull applyTimeStart> and loanAgent.APPLY_TIME >= #applyTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull applyTimeEnd> and loanAgent.APPLY_TIME < #applyTimeEnd# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signTimeStart> and loanAgent.SIGN_TIME >= #signTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signTimeEnd> and loanAgent.SIGN_TIME < #signTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull releaseTimeStart> and loanAgent.RELEASE_TIME >= #releaseTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull releaseTimeEnd> and loanAgent.RELEASE_TIME < #releaseTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<if test="yuCuiOriGrpId!=null and yuCuiOriGrpId!=''"> and (orgHierarchy.TEAM_ID=#yuCuiOriGrpId# or orgHierarchy.DISTRICT_ID=#yuCuiOriGrpId# or orgHierarchy.hq_id=#yuCuiOriGrpId#) </if>
UNION ALL SELECT c.PKID, loanAgent.CASE_CODE, INFO.PROPERTY_ADDR, loanAgent.LOAN_SRV_CODE AS LOAN_SRV_CODE_OLD, loanAgent.EXCUTOR_ID AS EXECUTOR_ID_OLD, loanAgent.EXCUTOR_TEAM, loanAgent.EXCUTOR_DISTRICT, loanAgent.CREATE_BY AS CREATE_ID_OLD, --loanAgent.excutor_team as 'PARENT_ORG_NAME_OLD', isnull(Convert(decimal(18,2),sign.CON_PRICE/10000),0) as 'CON_PRICE', loanAgent.APPLY_TIME, loanAgent.SIGN_TIME, loanAgent.CREATE_TIME, rel.RELEASE_TIME AS RELEASE_TIME, ISNULL(CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), loanAgent.APPLY_AMOUNT), 0) AS 'LOAN_AMOUNT' , ISNULL(CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), loanAgent.SIGN_AMOUNT), 0) AS 'SIGN_AMOUNT' , ISNULL(CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 2), rel.RELEASE_AMOUNT),0) AS 'ACTUAL_AMOUNT', c.ORG_ID, c.DISTRICT_ID, C.LEADING_PROCESS_ID, caseInfo.GRP_NAME, caseInfo.QJDS_NAME, finOrg.FIN_ORG_NAME as 'finOrgName', loanAgent.cust_name as custName, caseInfo.AGENT_NAME as AgentName, loanAgent.ZJ_NAME, CASE WHEN loanAgent.CUST_CARD_TYPE='SFZ' THEN '身份证' WHEN loanAgent.CUST_CARD_TYPE='HZ' THEN '护照' WHEN loanAgent.CUST_CARD_TYPE='XGSFZ' THEN '香港身份证' WHEN loanAgent.CUST_CARD_TYPE='GATXZ' THEN '港澳通行证' WHEN loanAgent.CUST_CARD_TYPE='TBZ' THEN '台胞证' END as custCardType, loanAgent.CUST_PAPER as custPaper
FROM sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE loanAgent INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE c ON c.CASE_CODE = loanAgent.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE_INFO caseInfo ON caseInfo.CASE_CODE = loanAgent.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_SIGN sign ON loanAgent.CASE_CODE = sign.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_REL rel ON rel.ELOAN_CODE = loanAgent.ELOAN_CODE and rel.CONFIRM_STATUS=1 INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO INFO ON INFO.CASE_CODE = loanAgent.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG finOrg ON finOrg.FIN_ORG_CODE = loanAgent.FIN_ORG_CODE <ifNotNull isJygw> and loanAgent.EXCUTOR_ID = #userId# </ifNotNull> INNER JOIN sctrans.v_yucui_org_hierarchy orgHierarchy ON orgHierarchy.ORG_ID = loanAgent.excutor_team WHERE loanAgent.CASE_CODE is not null and loanAgent.CASE_CODE !='' AND (loanAgent.STATUS IS NULL OR loanAgent.STATUS='VALID')
<ifNotNull applyTimeStart> and loanAgent.APPLY_TIME >= #applyTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull applyTimeEnd> and loanAgent.APPLY_TIME < #applyTimeEnd# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signTimeStart> and loanAgent.SIGN_TIME >= #signTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signTimeEnd> and loanAgent.SIGN_TIME < #signTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull releaseTimeStart> and rel.RELEASE_TIME >= #releaseTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull releaseTimeEnd> and rel.RELEASE_TIME < #releaseTimeEnd# </ifNotNull> <if test="yuCuiOriGrpId!=null and yuCuiOriGrpId!=''"> and (orgHierarchy.TEAM_ID=#yuCuiOriGrpId# or orgHierarchy.DISTRICT_ID=#yuCuiOriGrpId# or orgHierarchy.hq_id=#yuCuiOriGrpId#) </if>

column.name: EVAL_FEE,RECORD_TIME
column.display: 评估费(元),评估确认时间
column.title: 评估费(元),评估确认时间
